@graph.caption: Samosa Pinwheels - Spiced Potato Pinwheels | VeganRicha.com #vegan #appetizer #samosa #glutenfree #veganricha

@graph.name: Samosa Pinwheels - Spiced Potato Pinwheels - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Samosa Pinwheels - Spiced Potato Pinwheels with quick Tamarind Chutney. Easy spiced potatoes with mint, drizzled with chutney, rolled into pinwheels. Vegan Fusion Recipe. Soy-free, easily gluten-free.

@graph.name: Samosa Pinwheels - Spiced Potato Pinwheels with Easy Tamarind Chutney
@graph.description: Spiced Potato Pinwheels with Easy Tamarind Chutney. Vegan Soy-free Oil-free Nut-free Recipe. Can be made Gluten-free with gluten-free tortillas. Makes 2 large tortillas (20 to 22 pinwheels)
recipeIngredient: 2  large 10 inch or larger tortillas. Use gluten-free tortillas to make gf
1/2 tsp chaat masala (or 1/8 tsp kala namak black salt)
1/4 tsp chaat masala (or 1/8 tsp kala namak black salt)

itemListElement.text: Mash the potatoes really well. Add spices and mix in. *You can also toast about 1/2 tsp cumin seeds on the skillet until fragrant and add to the potatoes.
itemListElement.name: Mash the potatoes really well. Add spices and mix in. *You can also toast about 1/2 tsp cumin seeds on the skillet until fragrant and add to the potatoes.

itemListElement.text: Pulse all the ingredients in a small blender until combined but not entirely smooth.
itemListElement.name: Pulse all the ingredients in a small blender until combined but not entirely smooth.

itemListElement.text: Add to the potato mixture and mix well. Taste and adjust salt, tang (amchoor) and heat (cayenne) of the potato mixture.
itemListElement.name: Add to the potato mixture and mix well. Taste and adjust salt, tang (amchoor) and heat (cayenne) of the potato mixture.

itemListElement.text: Mix everything until well combined. You can warm the mixture in a skillet or microwave to help the ingredients flavors gel well if needed.
itemListElement.name: Mix everything until well combined. You can warm the mixture in a skillet or microwave to help the ingredients flavors gel well if needed.

itemListElement.text: Taste and adjust sweet (sugar) and tang (add lemon juice or kala namak for tangier).
itemListElement.name: Taste and adjust sweet (sugar) and tang (add lemon juice or kala namak for tangier).

itemListElement.text: Take 2 large tortillas and spread the potato mixture. Press to even it out.
itemListElement.name: Take 2 large tortillas and spread the potato mixture. Press to even it out.

itemListElement.text: Drizzle some of the tamarind chutney on the potato mixture. Roll up the tortillas tightly. Slice with a sharp serrated* knife.
itemListElement.name: Drizzle some of the tamarind chutney on the potato mixture. Roll up the tortillas tightly. Slice with a sharp serrated* knife.

itemListElement.text: Serve as is, chill for a few minutes and serve with or without tamarind chutney.
itemListElement.name: Serve as is, chill for a few minutes and serve with or without tamarind chutney.

itemListElement.text: You can also bake the pinwheels at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 13 to 15 minutes to crisp the tortillas.The pinwheels get sturdy as potato filling sets with the baking.
itemListElement.name: You can also bake the pinwheels at 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 13 to 15 minutes to crisp the tortillas.The pinwheels get sturdy as potato filling sets with the baking.

itemListElement.text: These pinwheels can be refrigerated for upto 2 days.
itemListElement.name: These pinwheels can be refrigerated for upto 2 days.
